workflows.name: video_icon_generation
workflows.description: Generate an icon image for video content. All requirements already specified in the workflow. Any video icon generation will use this workflow.

parameters.name: icon_description
parameters.purpose: A description of the icon to be generated for video
parameters.details: This can be as simple as a single word, or as complex as a detailed description including elements, composition, accent color, etc.

workflows.name: script_writing
workflows.description: Writing course script. All requirements already specified in the workflow.

parameters.name: course_folder_link
parameters.purpose: the folder in which the course script will be stored
parameters.details: This should be a link to the folder where user put course outline and research documents. This folder link will be provided by user.

workflows.name: script_editing
workflows.description: Editing course script. All requirements already specified in the workflow.

parameters.name: lesson_script_document_id
parameters.purpose: the id of the Google Docs file which contains the lesson script to be edited
parameters.details: This should be the ID of the Google Docs file that contains the lesson script to be edited. You must provide this ID using the `get_file_id` tool based on the folder link (provided by the user) and lesson script filename

parameters.name: editing_message
parameters.purpose: include the ways and aspects of the editing from the user
parameters.details: This should include the specific ways and aspects of the editing that the user wants to apply to the lesson script. For example, it can be a request to change the tone, add more details, or correct grammar, etc.
